jaxtari.environment module

class jaxtari.environment.JaxEnvironment[source]

Bases: Generic[EnvState, EnvObs, EnvInfo]

Abstract class for a JAX environment. Generics: EnvState: The type of the environment state. EnvObs: The type of the observation. EnvInfo: The type of the additional information.

get_action_space() → Tuple[source]

Returns the action space of the environment. Returns: The action space of the environment as a tuple.

get_observation_space() → Tuple[source]

Returns the observation space of the environment. Returns: The observation space of the environment as a tuple.

render(state: EnvState) → Tuple[Array][source]

Renders the environment state to a single image. :param state: The environment state.

Returns: A single image of the environment state.

reset() → Tuple[EnvState, EnvObs][source]

Resets the environment to the initial state. Returns: The initial observation and the initial environment state.

step(state: EnvState, action) → Tuple[EnvState, EnvObs, float, bool, EnvInfo][source]

Takes a step in the environment. :param state: The current environment state. :param action: The action to take.

Returns: The observation, the new environment state, the reward, whether the state is terminal, and additional info.

class jaxtari.wrappers.FlattenObservationWrapper(env)[source]

Bases: GymnaxWrapper

Transform the observations of the environment into jnp arrays and flatten. Also changes position of state in the return tuple to comply with gymnax. Always apply this wrapper first.

observation_space() → Box[source]

class jaxtari.wrappers.GymnaxWrapper(env)[source]

Bases: object
